titleStmt.title: The Salamanca doctors comment upon the proclamation for apprehending Colonel John Rumsey, Richard Rumbold, Richard Nelthorp, Wade, Goodenough, Walcot, Thompson, Burton, Hone, for conspiring to kill the King

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the Heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Political satire on Titus Oates"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
